name: bone devil
traits_and_actions:
Saving Throws
Int +5, Wis +6, Cha +7
Skills
Deception +7, Insight +6
Damage Resistances
cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
Damage Immunities
fire, poison
Condition Immunities
poisoned
Senses
darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 12
Languages
Infernal, telepathy 120 ft.
Devil’s Sight.
Magical darkness doesn’t impede the devil’s darkvision.
Magic Resistance.
The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Actions
Multiattack.
The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.
Claw.
Melee Weapon Attack:
+8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target.
Hit:
8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.
Sting.
Melee Weapon Attack:
+8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target.
Hit:
13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
